src_original: yady asaṃtīrako na viparyāsaḥ yat tarhi sūtra uktaṃ.
tgt_original: 此四顛倒，須陀洹幾斷、幾不斷？

src_original: dvādaśa viparyāsā iti.  caturṣu viparyāseṣu pratyekaṃ saṃjñācittadṛṣṭiviparyāsā iti.  katham ity ucyate.  anitye nityam iti vistaraḥ evaṃ yāvad anātmany ātmeti.
tgt_original: 如毘婆闍婆提說： 有十二顛倒，謂無常有常想顛倒、心顛倒、見顛倒；

src_original: duḥkhe sukham iti saṃjñādṛṣṭacittaviparyāsās trayaḥ.
tgt_original: 苦有樂想顛倒、心顛倒、見顛倒；

src_original: aśucau śucīty eta eva trayaḥ.  yāvad anātmany ātmeti eta eva traya iti.
tgt_original: 無我我想顛倒、心顛倒、見顛倒； 不淨淨想顛倒、心顛倒、見顛倒。

src_original: tatrāṣṭau darśanaprahātavyā iti.
tgt_original: 八是見道斷，四是修道斷。

src_original: anitye nityam iti saṃjñācittadṛṣṭiviparyāsās trayaḥ.  anātmany ātmeti punas trayaḥ.  duḥkhe sukham iti dṛṣṭiviparyāsaḥ.
tgt_original: 八見道斷者，無常常想顛倒、見顛倒； 苦有樂想顛倒、見顛倒；

src_original: aśucau śucīti dṛṣṭiviparyāsa iti.  catvāro bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ.
tgt_original: 無我我想顛倒、見顛倒； 不淨淨想顛倒、見顛倒。

src_original: tatrāyuṣmāṃ chāriputro bhikṣūn āmaṃtrayate sma.
tgt_original: 經說： 尊者舍利弗語諸比丘：

src_original: ihāyuṣmaṃto bhikṣuḥ śīlasaṃpannaś ca bhavati samādhisampannaś ca prajñāsaṃpannaś ca.  so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca.  asti caitat sthānam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
tgt_original: 諸長老當知，若比丘戒具足、定具足、慧具足者，能數數入出滅受想定。

src_original: sa na haiva dṛṣṭa eva dharme pratipady evājñām ārāgayati.  nāpi maraṇakālasamaye.  bhedāc ca kāyasyātikramya devān kavaḍīkārabhakṣān anyatamasmin divye manomaye kāya upapadyate.  sa tatropapanno 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ [Tib.151b] samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca.
tgt_original: 若於現法及死時，不得阿羅漢果，身壞命終過摶食諸天，生摩㝹摩身天中，復於彼處數數出入滅受想定。

src_original: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmān udāyī tasyām eva parṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhut saṃnipatitaḥ.  athāyuṣmān udāyī āyuṣmaṃtaṃ śāriputram idam avocat.
tgt_original: 爾時長老優陀夷住彼會中，語尊者舍利弗言：

src_original: asthānam etad āyuṣmaṃ chāriputrānavakāśo yad bhikṣur anyatamasmiṃ divye manomaye kāye upapanno 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣtḥate cāsti caitat sthānam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
tgt_original: 尊者舍利弗！

src_original: asti caitat sthānam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.  tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmān udāyī tasyām eva parṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhut saṃnipatitaḥ.  athāyuṣmān udāyī āyuṣmaṃtaṃ śāriputram idam avocat.  asthānam etad āyuṣmaṃ chāriputrānavakāśo yad bhikṣur anyatamasmiṃ divye manomaye kāye upapanno 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣtḥate cāsti caitat sthānam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
tgt_original: 復次尊者舍利弗作是念： 此所論事，必聞於佛。

src_original: athāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitad abhavat.
tgt_original: 爾時舍利弗作是念：

src_original: yāvat trir api me ayaṃ bhikṣur bhāṣitaṃ prativahati pratikrośati.  na ca me kaścit sabrahmacārī bhāṣitam abhyanumodate.  yan nv ahaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmeyaṃ.
tgt_original: 此比丘三違我所說，諸梵行比丘亦無讚歎我所說者，我今應往詣世尊所。

src_original: athāyuṣmāṃ chāriputro yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāṃtaḥ.  upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vaṃditvaikāṃte niṣaṇṇaḥ.  ekāṃte niṣaṇṇaś cāyuśmāṃ chāriputro bhikṣūn āmaṃtrayate sma.
tgt_original: 爾時尊者舍利弗往詣佛所，到已頭面禮足，却坐一面，語諸比丘：

src_original: ihāyuṣmaṃto bhikṣuḥ śīlasaṃpannaś ca bhavati.  pūrvavat.
tgt_original: 諸長老當知，若比丘戒具足，乃至廣說。

src_original: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān udāyī pūrvavat.  evaṃ dvir api trir apy āyuṣmān udāyī āyuṣmaṃtaṃ śāriputram idam avocat.  pūrvavat (Abhidh-k-vy 165).
tgt_original: 爾時長老優陀夷在彼會中，語尊者舍利弗言，乃至無有是處。

src_original: athāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitad abhavat.
tgt_original: 爾時尊者舍利弗作是念：

src_original: śāstur api me purastād ayaṃ bhikṣur yāvat trir api bhāṣitaṃ prativahati pratikrośati.  na ca me kaścit sabrahmacārī [Tib.152a] bhāṣitam abhyanumodate.  yan nv ahaṃ tūṣnīṃ syāṃ.
tgt_original: 今此比丘於世尊前違我所說，諸梵行比丘亦無稱讚我所說者，我今應當默然。

src_original: athāyuṣmāṃ chāriputras tūṣṇīm abhūt.  tatra bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtam udāyinam āmaṃtrayate sma.  kaṃ punas tvam udāyinn anyatamaṃ divyaṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ saṃjānīṣe.  nanu yāvad evārūpiṇaṃ saṃjñāmayaṃ.  evaṃ bhadanta.
tgt_original: 爾時舍利弗即便默然。

src_original: prathamadhyānam apekṣya kāmadhātur audāriko mahābhisaṃskārataratvāt.  kāmadhātum apekṣya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ sūkṣmam alpābhisaṃskārataratvāt praśāntam iti.
tgt_original: 心次第相，方而有麁細遍三界中。 然從欲界乃至梵世，有覺有觀。

src_original: evaṃ yāvad bhavāgraṃ sūkṣmaṃ.  prakārabhedād api tasyām eva bhūmau āpekṣikyāv audārikasūkṣmate.  tadyathā ya eva te trayaḥ kleśānāṃ mūlaprakārā mṛdumadhyādhimātrā guṇānāṃ ca.  kāmadhātau yāvad bhavāgre teṣām adhimātraḥ kleśa audārikaḥ.
tgt_original: 此麁心細心乃至有頂可得，然說覺觀從欲界乃至梵世中有，是故汝等所說是惡說、非善說，惡受持、非善受持。 阿毘曇人作如是說：

src_original: evaṃ bhūmiprakārabhedenāpekṣikyāv (Abhidh-k-vy 139) audārikasūkṣmate ity ā bhavāgrād audārikasūkṣmate syātāṃ.  aniṣṭaṃ caitat.
tgt_original: 所以者何？ 我以種種事故說麁細相，非以一事。

src_original: vitarkavicārayoḥ kāmadhātuprathamadhyānabhūmikatvād iti.  na caudārikasūkṣmatayā jātibhedo yukta iti.
tgt_original: 如說纏麁使細，是中不說覺麁觀細。 所以者何？

src_original: vitarkavicārayor jātibheda iṣyate.  anyo vitarko 'nyo vicāra iti.  na caudarikatvena sūkṣmatvena ca vitarkavicārayor yathākramaṃ svabhāvabhedo yuktaḥ.
tgt_original: 此二法非覺觀相故。 如說色陰是麁、四陰是細，如是則說覺之與觀俱是細法。

src_original: kiṃkāraṇaṃ.
tgt_original: 所以者何？
